entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as kneeling beside Dumbledore's body and later talking to his friends. He is also shown to be emotional about Dobby's death.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's body is found at the foot of the tallest tower at Hogwarts.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix's silver knife is used to pierce Dobby's body.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is described as being curled upon the grass and pierced by Bellatrix's silver knife. Harry is emotional about his death.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as taking Hermione inside.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is gathering around Harry as he kneels over Dobby.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as gathering around Harry.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as gathering around Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's whereabouts are asked by Harry.

relationships.description: Harry is kneeling beside Dumbledore's body.
Bellatrix's silver knife is used to pierce Dobby's body, implying a conflict between Harry and Bellatrix.
Harry is emotional about Dobby's death.
Bill takes Hermione inside, implying that he is taking care of her.
Fleur is gathering around Harry as he kneels over Dobby.
Dean is mentioned as gathering around Harry.
Luna is mentioned as gathering around Harry.
Harry asks about Hermione's whereabouts, showing concern for her.
